summary: Techno-functional IT professional with over 10 years of experience in IT infrastructure, security, network administration and data centre operations. Experienced in ISO 27001:2005 implementation, vulnerability assessment, and managing enterprise security solutions across multiple sites. Proven track record in planning, deploying and securing enterprise networks, managing backups, AD administration, and leading technical teams.

experience.title: Information Security Analyst / Consultant
experience.description: GAP analysis, policy and procedure management, OS hardening, information asset classification, managing SOA, vulnerability assessment, security operations, and deployment of security solutions. Implemented ISO 27001:2005 information security framework; deployed Symantec Endpoint Management, Juniper firewall, Radware Load Balancer, Barracuda Spam Firewall; managed Barracuda Spam Firewall and Blue Coat Web Content Filtering for remote sites. Conducted internal/external vulnerability assessments; led technology integration and group policy deployment; enforced application and device control; led a team of security professionals; provided end-user training; Active Directory health monitoring, DNS/DHCP, and AD replication.

experience.title: Assistant Manager
experience.description: EDP/Facilities Management; interacted with 60 core sites for sourcing client security products and solutions; maintained asset database, tracked asset movements, software/hardware asset control; OS and application deployment; server/network/power monitoring.

education.degree: Bachelor of Engineering in Computer Science & Engineering
education.school: Jawaharlal Institute of Technology (JIT), Rajiv Gandhi Proudyogiki Vishwavidhalaya, Bhopal
